doc:
Amanda Bearse https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amanda_Bearse 0 Amanda Bearse (born August 9, 1958) is an American actress, director and comedian best known for her role as neighbor Marcy Rhoades/D'Arcy on Married... with Children, a sitcom that aired in the United States from 1987 to 1997, and for her performance in the 1985 horror film Fright Night opposite William Ragsdale. Amanda_Bearse ( born August_9_,_1958 ) is an_American_actress_,_director_and_comedian best_known for her_role as neighbor_Marcy_Rhoades/D_'_Arcy on Married ... with Children , a_sitcom that aired in the_United_States from 1987 to 1997 , and for her_performance in the_1985_horror_film_Fright_Night_opposite_William_Ragsdale .
